title: Social Media Manager (Real Estate)
job_overview:
We are looking for a Social Media Manager with real estate experience to help grow and manage our online presence. This role combines creativity and strategy—ideal for someone skilled in content creation, audience engagement, lead generation, and basic admin support.

TO APPLY MAKE SURE YOU ATTACH YOUR RESUME LINK AND PORTFOLIO LINK. 

Key Responsibilities:
-Develop and execute effective social media strategies tailored for the real estate market.
-Create, schedule, and publish engaging content across platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok, etc.).
-Design eye-catching graphics using Canva to support posts and marketing campaigns.
-Monitor inboxes, respond to comments and messages, and foster audience interaction.
-Analyze content performance and adjust strategies to improve reach and conversions.
-Align content with marketing goals in coordination with the team.
-Stay updated with the latest trends in social media and real estate marketing.
-Generate leads through targeted content and campaigns.
-(Preferred) Write and publish SEO-optimized blog posts to drive traffic and visibility.

TO APPLY MAKE SURE YOU ATTACH YOUR RESUME LINK AND PORTFOLIO LINK. 

Qualifications & Requirements:
-At least 1 year of experience in social media management,  in real estate.
-Strong knowledge of social platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok).
-Experience with content creation, graphics, and basic video editing.
-Proficiency in tools like Canva, and experience with CRMs such as Zillow, FollowUpBoss, or Go High Level is preferred.
-SEO and blog writing skills are highly preferred.
-Excellent English communication skills (verbal & written).
-Able to work independently, meet deadlines, and handle multiple tasks efficiently.
-Must be available to work night shift (PST hours).
-Must have a reliable computer and stable internet connection.
-Able to start ASAP.

TO APPLY MAKE SURE YOU ATTACH YOUR RESUME LINK AND PORTFOLIO LINK.
